comments.comments_text: Luis Muriel (Atalanta) produces an inaccurate low pass into the box that is blocked by the one of the defenders. If this pass had slipped through, the ball would have probably ended up in the back of the net. Atalanta have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: Phil Foden (Manchester City) should have been more careful. He commits a bad foul, receives his second yellow card and is sent-off!

comments.comments_text: Nicolas Otamendi (Manchester City) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Orel Grinfeld didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
